silver: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.

Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.
Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls. Gain 3 gold.
After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
Your units that start combat with no adjacent allies gain a 20% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.
Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.
Your Tier 1 and 2 champions gain 15% Attack Speed and Move Speed.
Completed items left on your bench for 4 rounds transform into Support Anvils.
If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.
Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.
After 8 player combats, choose 1 of 4 Support items.

Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

The anvil offers 4 choices.
Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 145 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.
When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.
Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.
For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slot. After, get 3 item components.
Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.
Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.
Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.
Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.
Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.
Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.
After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).
Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.
Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.
Increase your current and max player health by 30.
Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.
You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 2 gold.
You get +3 Augment rerolls for all other augment choices. Gain 7 gold.
Set your win streak to +4. Gain 4 gold.
The first time each ally unit falls below 60% health, they restore 100-220 health (based on stage) over 2.5 seconds.

Each time an allied champion dies, 30% Shred and Sunder the nearest 4 enemies for 6 seconds.

Shred: reduces Magic Resist, Sunder: reduces Armor
Gain 3 random 2-star 1 cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.
Your team gains 10 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 2 Health, 1 Attack Damage, and 1 Ability Power.
Gain a temporary item that unequips and transforms at the start of each round. The item quality increases each Stage.
If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 12% Attack Speed and 150 Health.
If you did not buy a champion last round, gain 2 free rerolls.
Gain 8 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.
Gain 15 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.
When you win or lose combat by 4 or fewer units, gain 2 gold next round.
Sell all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and a 2-star 1-cost champion.
Your team has 8% Omnivamp, increased by 1% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.
Your champion that starts combat in the center of the board gains 15% damage and 15% max Health.
gold: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

Your team gains 90-170 Shield for 3 seconds after casting their Ability. The Shield amount scales with round of the game.

Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 65 Health and 7% Attack Speed for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 18% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.
Your team has 9% Omnivamp, increased by 1.5% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.
Whenever one of your champion casts, their next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 120% of their Ability Power.
Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 5-100% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 50% of the damage dealt.
Gain a random component. For every 3 Charms you purchase this game, gain another component (max +4).
When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 550 Health. When one copy dies, the other gains a 40% max health Shield for 6 seconds. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.
Gain a Sterak's Gage. When its effect triggers, the holder gains 35% Attack Speed for the rest of combat and immunity to crowd control for 10 seconds.

Your team deals 9% more damage.

Deal 18% more damage instead if you have less active non-unique traits than your opponent.
Gain 3 random 1-cost champion. After 1 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.
Gain a Galio. Your strongest Galio has +3 range and gains 15 Mana and 8 Ability Power on each attack. His Ability deals 125% more damage, but no longer stuns or reduces damage.
Gain 2 Galios. Your strongest Galio gain +3 Range and gains 15 Mana and 8 Ability Power on each attack. His spell deals 125% increased damage but no longer stuns or reduces damage.
Gain a 2-star Lillia. Your strongest Lillia gains 125% Attack Speed and moves 75% faster. Her Ability deals 260% bonus damage, but only hits 1 target.
Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble's Ability deals 190% damage and costs 30 less Mana but no longer reduces damage. Rumble also gains 20% Omnivamp.
Gain 2 Rumbles. Your strongest Rumble's Ability deals 190% damage and costs 30 less Mana but no longer reduces damage. Rumble also gains 20% Omnivamp.
Gain a 2-star Elise. Your strongest Elise's Ability no longer Stuns, but poisons her target and the 2 closest enemies with 120% damage over 4 seconds.
Gain 2 Wukongs. Your strongest Wukong's Ability scales with Attack Damage instead of resists. After each cast, Wukong gains stacking 12% Attack Damage and 20% Attack Speed.
Gain a Nunu. Your strongest Nunu gains 100 Health, 200% Damage Amp per 150 Health, and his heal scales with Health. Whenever his Ability kills an enemy, Nunu permanently gains 35 Health.
Gain 2 Nunus. Your strongest Nunu gains 100 Health and deals 200% bonus damage per 150 Health. Whenever his Ability kills an enemy, Nunu permanently gains 35 Health.
Gain a 2-star Poppy. Your strongest Poppy's Ability no longer Shields, but strikes 3 times, dealing 80% of the original damage.
Gain a 2-star Blitzcrank. Your strongest Blitzcrank becomes supercharged, dealing magic damage to 2 nearby enemies every 5 seconds and on every Ability cast.
The first time you have 165 or more gold, gain a 2-star 5-cost champion and 3 items tailored to them.
Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer your loss streak, the bigger the payout.
The first time you activate 7 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 6 random emblems.
Your Preservers gain both Mana and Health restoration from the trait. Preservers deal 15% more damage. Gain a Bard and a Zilean.
Arcana champions deal 10% bonus damage. If they start combat holding 2 items, they gain a recommended 3rd completed item. Gain an Ahri and a Hecarim.
Honeymancers gain 1 more Bee. When Bees jump to a new Honeymancer, the Honeymancer gains a 10% max Health Shield. Gain a Blitzcrank and a Kog'Maw.

Sugarcrafters gain 60 Health and 10% chance to drop 1 gold on kill for each component they hold. Gain a Soraka and a Rumble.

Artifact, Support, and Radiant items count as 2 components.
Pyromancers' attacks deal 5 bonus magic damage for every 3 cinder collected. Gain an Akali and a Shen.
Dragons gain 10% Health and 18% Attack Speed. After Dragons score 60 champion takedowns, gain a Smolder. Gain a Nomsy and a Shyvana.
Your Hunters execute enemies below 10% health and gain 5% Attack Speed. Gain a Twitch and a Kog'maw.
Shapeshifters that begin combat next to another Shapeshifter gain 30 permanent Health. Gain an Elise and a Jayce.
After casting an Ability, Chronomancers gain 40% Attack Speed and 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Gain a Jax and a Zilean.
The Frost trait also grants 1 placeable Frost Wolf equipped with a Protector's Vow. The wolf gains 15% Attack Speed and 100 Health per Frost tier. Gain a Warwick and a Zilean.
Every time your Scholars spend 80 Mana, all Scholars gain 12% Attack Speed. Gain a Zoe and an Ahri.
Witch curses last forever. Witch Abilities also curse the nearest uncursed champion. If all champions are cursed, Witches gain 20% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Poppy and a Cassiopeia.
Whenever a Mage casts an Ability, they grant 5 Mana to the nearest ally. Gain a Soraka and a Galio.
Your Multistriker's attacks apply a stack on their target for 5 seconds. Every 3rd stack deals true damage equal to 4% of the target's max Health. Gain a Kassadin and an Ashe.
Combat start: Your strongest Bastion gains 20% Health. When other unit die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Poppy and a Nunu.
Every 3 seconds, all Faeries restore 3% max Health, and the Faerie Queen gains 100% Attack Damage and Ability Power for every other suriving Faerie. Gain a Lillia and a Tristana.
The Eldritch summon is holding beneficial items. The summon gains bonus 10% Health and 10 Ability Power. Gain an Elise and a Syndra.
Your Vangards have 30% stronger shields. Vanguards become immune to crowd control for 6 seconds whenever they gain a shield. Gain a Rumble and a Blitzcrank.
After each player combat, gain gold equal to the length of your win or loss streak (max 4 gold).
Shapeshifters that begin combat next to another Shapeshifter gain 30 permanent Health. Shapeshifters gain 60 Health now. Gain an Elise and a Jayce.
Gain 2 Shens. Your strongest Shen's Ability no longer grants damage reduction, but now summons a large molten pillar that damages enemies in a large line.
prismatic: At What Cost
Immediately go to level 6. You don't get to choose your future augments.
Caretaker's Chosen

As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items
Birthday Present
Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (min: 1-cost).
Blinding Speed

Gain a Red Buff, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!
Build a Bud!
Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion and 8 gold.

Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).
Final Ascension
Your team deals 20% more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 50% more damage.
Spoils of War III
Enemies have a 40% chance to drop loot when killed.
Prismatic Ticket
Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.
Going Long

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
Hedge Fund

Gain 22 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.
Shopping Spree
When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds. Gain 4 gold.

Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

March of Progress
Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.
Tiniest Titan
Gain 2 player health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
Tiniest Titan+

Gain 2 player health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.
